edu.umass.cs.msocket.common.proxy.policies

Class FixedProxyPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.msocket.common.proxy.policies.ProxySelectionPolicy
      • edu.umass.cs.msocket.common.proxy.policies.FixedProxyPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FixedProxyPolicy
extends ProxySelectionPolicy
    This class defines a Fixed Proxy Policy where the user can specify himself a list of IP addresses of well-known proxies to use. The list will be provided as is to MServerSocket in the same order as the one given in the constructor.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getProxyIPs

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getProxyIPs(java.util.List<edu.umass.cs.msocket.proxy.location.ProxyStatusInfo> proxies,
                                                    java.net.Socket acceptedSocket)
        Description copied from class: ProxySelectionPolicy
        Server side implementation of the policy. Return the IPs of the selected proxies based upon the policy. This is called by the location service.
        Specified by:
        getProxyIPs in class ProxySelectionPolicy
        Parameters:
        proxies - the current status of active proxies in the system
        acceptedSocket - client socket that was accepted by the location service
        Returns:
        ordered list of IP:port of proxies selected by the policy
